eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
&{\cal L}_{eff} =
-\displaystyle\frac{a^2-b^2}{2e^2}{\Big (}1-\displaystyle\frac{e^2}{12\pi^2}
\ln\displaystyle\frac{m^2}{\mu^2}{\Big)} \nonumber\\
&- \displaystyle\frac{ab}{4\pi^3} \sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}
{\Big [}\coth(\displaystyle\frac{n \pi b}{a}){\Big (} {\rm ci}(\displaystyle\frac{n \pi m^2}{a})
\cos(\displaystyle\frac{n \pi m^2}{a}) \nonumber\\
&+{\rm si}(\displaystyle\frac{n \pi m^2}{a}) \sin(\displaystyle\frac{n \pi m^2}{a}){\Big )} \nonumber\\
&-\displaystyle\frac{1}{2} \coth (\displaystyle\frac{n \pi a}{b})
{\Big (} \exp(\displaystyle\frac{n \pi m^2}{b})
{\rm Ei}(-\displaystyle\frac{n \pi m^2}{b}) \nonumber\\
&+ \exp(-\displaystyle\frac{n \pi m^2}{b}){\rm Ei}(\displaystyle\frac{n \pi m^2}{b}
-i\epsilon){\Big )}{\Big ]},
\
